name: skipper-s3
description: Stream file uploads, downloads, and transloads to and from S3.  Plus some other utilities like `rm` and `ls`.

scripts.test: node -e "require('skipper-adapter-tests')({mocha: { timeout: 360000 }, module: require('./'), bucket:process.env.BUCKET || 'skipper-adapter-tests', key: process.env.KEY, secret: process.env.SECRET});"

author: Mike McNeil
